snippet.title: Hexia - Steam version 1.0.0
snippet.description:
Hexia is a strategy game where your task, as King of your assigned Realm, is to create and expand territory, build new infrastructure, and command and guide your people. You will face events that present themselves to you as opportunities for improvement or as unforeseen setbacks to overcome, and your choices will be critical in allowing your kingdom to have the success it deserves and thus gain a place in the world.

The Hexia universe is full of unexpected surprises and mysteries waiting to be uncovered. A deep and intricate story lies behind every random event, and every decision you make will have a consequence on the continuation of the world's plot, as well as on the kingdom's resources.

👉 Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1173730/Hexia/
